Articles.Content:
Hello, I'm Carlos

I'm bad introducing mySelf, neither making new friends, so everybody's welcome if try to reach me.

If anyone's curious, i like mods, but right now just to try the game vanilla(unmodded) in hard campaign to take a look on the felling for new users.

I'm doing things like this:

(As requested : you can find the craft here )

Edited March 18, 2015 by elMestre
Added craft file
Hi elMestre, I like the wing design on your spaceplane

Hello and welcome to the forums, elMestre!

You have chosen to come to a real nice place on the web, so i am sure, you will find some friends and fellow kerbonauts here soon.

Your picture looks quite nice. If you did all that in vanilla on hard campaign, you have done some pretty big steps already.

So, keep them pictures coming and enjoy your stay.

Godspeed, commander!

Welcome to the forums, elMestre. If you need help with anything in the forums, don't hesitate to ask. More than likely, someone else has encountered the same thing and may be willing to help.

Oh, and ALWAYS remember, struts are a good thing!

Hello and thanks to everybody.

More than help, I came looking for company

I've been playing (and reading in the Forum) last year and half

By the way, just after posting this image... I said myself hat I accomplished what I wanted playing vanilla.

I set up my repository and...


ls GameData/

000_Toolbar               IntakeBuildAid            ProceduralFairings
ActiveTextureManagement   KSP-AVC                   RealChute
AmbientLightAdjustment    KerbalEngineer            SDHI
AnimatedDecouplers        KerbalIspDifficultyScaler ShipManifest
ConnectedLivingSpace      MP_Nazari                 SmokeScreen
CrewManifest              ModuleManager.2.5.9.dll   Squad
DeadlyReentry             ModuleManager.ConfigCache Telemachus
EnhancedNavBall           ModuleManager.ConfigSHA   ThunderAerospace
FerramAerospaceResearch   MordeFlag                 Trajectories
FinalFrontier.dat         NASAmission               TriggerTech
GameData                  Nereid                    toolbar-settings.dat
ImprovedChaseCamera       NodeResizer

Welcome!

That spaceplane is very impressive. Do you intend on posting the craft file?

Yes, no problem

As you like It I will post it in the exchange, and set a link here

Most likely on the weekend, I will try today, but can't promise nothing

Yes, no problem

As you like It I will post it in the exchange, and set a link here

Most likely on the weekend, I will try today, but can't promise nothing

So.... you promise something?

Yeah, there's me picking apart English. You may want to get used to that. Welcome to the Forum!

(See, I'm still around... )

U're right.

Double negation is Absolutely wrong in English.

Correct is: I can't promise it, or I promise nothing, but my mother language betrayed me

U're right.

Double negation is Absolutely wrong in English.

Correct is: I can't promise it, or I promise nothing, but my mother language betrayed me

?????

?????

Double Negatives. They're wrong in grammar. But don't worry newcomer, you more than make up for that in your craft. Pure awesomeness is what you are!

I've docked before, and I even have a station, and some accessories, but mine is a shrimp compared to yours!

Also, didn't say this before, but Hi.

EDIT: The stuff above is not an edit, and also why did you join in August of 2013, but not come and do more until now?

Edited March 20, 2015 by RAINCRAFTER

Well, I always had been that shy guy that sits quiet in the corner, waiting for other people to come and try to know me.

Since I tried waiting so hard, and for so long time, and It didn't worked, I decided that I have to change something
